action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete created VMs
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
disable_root: true
ssh_enabled: True
ssh_pwauth: True
runcmd:
- systemctl restart sshd
- userdel -r centos
- touch /opt/xtract-vm/.hermeskey
- 'dmidecode -s system-uuid | tee /opt/xtract-vm/.hermeskey'
- chown mgmtserver:vmxtract /opt/xtract-vm/.hermeskey
- chmod 440 /opt/xtract-vm/.hermeskey
- usermod -s /sbin/nologin root
- passwd -l root
# Set capabilities so that mgmtserver can bind to port 80 and tgtagent can mount
- setcap CAP_NET_BIND_SERVICE=ep /opt/xtract-vm/bin/mgmt-server
- setcap CAP_SYS_ADMIN=ep /opt/xtract-vm/bin/tgtagent
- systemctl restart mgmtserver tgtagent iptables
- chmod 555 /
- 'semanage fcontext --add --type user_home_dir_t "/home/admin(/.*)?"'
- restorecon -FRv /

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for powering on an application
action_list.name: action_poweron

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for suspending an application
action_list.name: action_suspend

action_list.description: System action for modifying an application
action_list.name: action_modify

action_list.description: System action for powering off an application
action_list.name: action_poweroff

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete created VMs
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

attrs.script:
curl -O https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/xtract-vm-update/xtract-upgrade.tar
tar -xvf xtract-upgrade.tar && cd xtract-vm-upgrade
XTRACT_VM_UI_PASSWORD=@@{PASSWORD}@@ ./upgrade
